title: Google\Cloud\BareMetalSolution\V2\Volume\SnapshotReservationDetail
name: SnapshotReservationDetail
description:
Details about snapshot space reservation and usage on the storage volume.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.baremetalsolution.v2.Volume.SnapshotReservationDetail

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.reserved_space_gib
params.description: The space on this storage volume reserved for snapshots, shown in GiB.

params.name: data.reserved_space_used_percent
params.description: The percent of snapshot space on this storage volume actually being used by the snapshot copies. This value might be higher than 100% if the snapshot copies have overflowed into the data portion of the storage volume.

params.name: data.reserved_space_remaining_gib
params.description: The amount, in GiB, of available space in this storage volume's reserved snapshot space.

params.name: data.reserved_space_percent
params.description: Percent of the total Volume size reserved for snapshot copies. Enabling snapshots requires reserving 20% or more of the storage volume space for snapshots. Maximum reserved space for snapshots is 40%. Setting this field will effectively set snapshot_enabled to true.

methods.name: getReservedSpaceGib
methods.description:

Enabling snapshots requires reserving 20% or more of the storage volume space for snapshots. Maximum reserved space for snapshots is 40%. Setting this field will effectively set snapshot_enabled to true.
